import React from "react"; import "../../../Styles/Pages/Cart/CartOrder.scss"; import MyButton from "../../Shared/MyButton"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; function CartOrder({ displayButton, displayCoupon, displayCopyright, displayPrivacy, }) { let history = useHistory(); return ( <>
